themes.scientific_basis: Based on research into shared goals and vision alignment in long-term relationships.
themes.description: This theme helps couples discuss their expectations for marriage, including future plans, values, and goals, to ensure they are building a unified vision for their life together.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by financial compatibility research and collaborative financial planning theories.
themes.description: This theme explores how couples will handle finances, including budgeting, saving, and managing expenses as a team, setting a solid financial foundation for marriage.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in Gottman's research on conflict styles and resolution strategies.
themes.description: This theme equips couples with tools to navigate disagreements constructively, focusing on effective communication and mutual respect to maintain harmony in their marriage.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on family systems theory and its impact on marital relationships.
themes.description: This theme helps couples explore how their relationships with their own families and in-laws may influence their marriage, including setting boundaries and managing expectations.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by research on emotional intimacy and its role in marital satisfaction.
themes.description: This theme focuses on strengthening emotional intimacy and connection, ensuring a foundation of trust and closeness that sustains the marriage beyond romantic passion.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in role theory and research on relationship expectations.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to discuss and define their roles within the marriage, from household responsibilities to career aspirations, ensuring mutual understanding.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research into the importance of rituals and routines in strengthening relationships.
themes.description: This theme helps couples establish meaningful rituals, such as weekly check-ins or shared activities, to create consistency and connection in their marriage.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by Gary Chapman's Five Love Languages and related research on relationship satisfaction.
themes.description: This theme helps couples identify and understand each other's love languages, fostering ways to express affection that resonates most with their partner.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from stress management and social support research in couples.
themes.description: This theme teaches couples how to support each other during stressful times, ensuring resilience and teamwork when faced with life's challenges.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on compatibility research, including values alignment and personality complementarity.
themes.description: This theme helps couples assess their long-term compatibility by exploring key areas like values, lifestyle preferences, and shared goals to reinforce their readiness for marriage.
